name: Curse of Zixx Demo
description:
Curse of Zixx is a 2d pixel art puzzle platformer. obtain each curse elemental power by defeating the realm spirit of each curse realm.

This Demo has 2 out of 4 curse realms which are the Fire and Water realm.

  • Fight to defend yourself from dangerous enemies.
  • Defeat the cursed spirit to obtain its elemental curse.
  • Solve puzzles to complete each level.
